features.featureTitle:
Update the Publisher dropdown menus in the following modals so the dropdown list is scrollable with a maximum height of 250px, shows a scrollbar when the list exceeds that height, and stays visually contained within the modal/viewport (i.e., does not extend beyond the modal or off-screen):
- Add Pioneer modal on the Pioneers page (frontend/src/components/pioneers/AddPioneerModal.tsx)
- Record Visit modal on the Shepherding page (frontend/src/components/shepherding/RecordVisitModal.tsx)
- Add Conductor modal on the Service Meeting Conductors page (frontend/src/components/conductors/ConductorModal.tsx)
- Add Trained Publisher modal on the Public Witnessing page (frontend/src/components/publicWitnessing/TrainedPublisherModal.tsx)

Keep all other behavior, styling, validation, and text unchanged.
